description: A trail guide covering south Kananaskis Country from Sheep River Falls in the north to Plateau Mountain in the south. Includes trail descriptions and photographs for 18 hikes, 2 overnight trips and 3 mountain bike rides. Map displays contour lines, campgrounds, lodges and visitor centres. Additional trails on inset map include Pasque Mountain, Plateau Mountain, Hailstone Butte Fire Lookout and Indian Graves Ridge.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Highwood  & Cataract Creek Map 3rd Edition
